sourcesContent:
<template lang="pug">
    .block
        h3.block__title How does it work
        .block__content
            p Lorem ipsum dolor sit amet, consectetur adipiscing elit. Maecenas eget purus augue. Vivamus nec neque efficitur, commodo purus id, aliquam nunc. Nam tristique vel est at pellentesque. Curabitur pulvinar metus sit amet nisl feugiat pulvinar. Praesent sit amet aliquam nisl. Nullam suscipit euismod tellus, ut condimentum nisl. Interdum et malesuada fames ac ante ipsum primis in faucibus. Vestibulum elementum urna non justo semper, id tempus enim commodo.
            .block__blockquote
                blockquote Lorem ipsum dolor sit amet, consectetur adipiscing elit. Maecenas eget purus augue. Vivamus nec neque. Lorem ipsum dolor sit amet, consectetur adipiscing elit.
            p(v-if="false") Lorem ipsum dolor sit amet, consectetur adipiscing elit. Maecenas eget purus augue. Vivamus nec neque efficitur, commodo purus id, aliquam nunc. Nam tristique vel est at pellentesque. Curabitur pulvinar metus sit amet nisl feugiat pulvinar. 
</template>

<script>
export default {
    name: 'BlockBlockquote',
    data: function(){
        return {}
    }
}
</script>

<style lang="scss" scoped>
    .block {
        max-width: 676px;
        margin-bottom: 50px;

        &__title {
            font-family: 'SFProDisplay-Bold';
            font-size: 36px;
            line-height: 56px;
            color: #37393E;
            margin-bottom: 10px;
            letter-spacing: -0.5px;
        }

        &__content {

            p {
                font-family: 'Roboto-Regular';
                font-style: normal;
                font-weight: 300;
                font-size: 15px;
                line-height: 25px;
                color: #37393E;
                opacity: 0.7;
                margin-bottom: 45px;
                letter-spacing: -0.1px;
                max-width: 640px;
            }
        }

        &__blockquote {
            display: block;
            position: relative;
            margin: 0 auto 48px auto;
            // max-width: 640px;

            blockquote {
                display: block;
                max-width: 487px;
                margin: 0 auto;
                font-family: 'Roboto-Regular';
                font-style: normal;
                font-weight: 500;
                font-size: 18px;
                line-height: 30px;
                text-align: center;
                color: #37393E;
                padding-right: 35px;
            }

            &:after {
                content: url('../../../assets/img/quotes.svg');
                position: absolute;
                left: 0;
                top: calc(50% + 5px);
                transform: translateY(-50%);
            }

            &:before {
                content: url('../../../assets/img/quotes.svg');
                position: absolute;
                right: 35px;
                top: calc(50% + 5px);
                transform: translateY(-50%) rotate(-180deg);
            }
        }
    }

    @media (max-width: 1200px) {
        .block {
            max-width: 600px;
        }
    }

    @media (max-width: 960px) {
        .block {
            max-width: 100%;

            &__content {
                p {
                    max-width: 100%;
                }
            }

            &__title {
                font-size: 32px;
                line-height: 56px;
            }
        }
    }

    @media (max-width: 640px) {
        .block {
            margin-bottom: 31px;

            &__content {
                p {
                    letter-spacing: 0.5px;
                    margin-bottom: 25px;
                }
            }

            &__title {
                margin-bottom: 5px;
            }

            &__blockquote {
                margin: 0 auto 36px auto;

                &:before {
                    top: 50%;
                }

                &:after {
                    top: 50%;
                }
            }
        }
    }
</style>
